official-title.#text: To expedite the planning and implementation of salvage timber sales as part of Forest Service and Department of the Interior restoration and rehabilitation activities for lands within the Gila and Lincoln National Forests and for Bureau of Land Management lands in New Mexico adversely impacted by the 2012 and 2013 fire seasons, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on
, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

short-title.#text: New Mexico Wildland Fire Emergency Salvage Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Expedited salvage timber sales in response to the Silver, Little Bear, and Whitewater-Baldy Complex Fires in New Mexico

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , with respect to the affected National Forest System lands, and the
, with respect to affected Bureau of Land Management lands, shall promptly plan and implement salvage timber sales of dead, damaged, or downed timber resulting from those wildfires.

text.#text: As part of the restoration and rehabilitation activities undertaken on lands within the Gila National Forest and Lincoln National Forest and on Bureau of Land Management lands adversely impacted by the 2012 Little Bear and Whitewater-Baldy Complex Fires and the 2013 Silver Fire in New Mexico, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , salvage timber sales conducted under such subsection shall proceed immediately and to completion notwithstanding any other provision of law, including the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: New Mexico Wildland Fire Emergency Salvage Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

text.#text: Due to the extraordinary severity of the wildfires referred to in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 14 of the National Forest Management Act of 1976
Forest and Rangeland Renewable Resources Planning Act of 1974
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Forest and Rangeland Renewable Resources Planning Act of 1974

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , and laws related to the management of timber on the lands covered by such subsection.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976
New Mexico Wildland Fire Emergency Salvage Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the notice, comment, and appeal requirements of

text.#text: administrative review, including, in the case of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 322 of the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 1993

text.#text: judicial review in any court of the United States.

text.#text: Nothing in this section shall be construed in a manner that would affect the land management plan applicable to any area designated as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System under
